channel.title: Bonzakids Pack
channel.description:
Between now and Next Month I am making a Utility pack for people to use that will include some things.
A Good Compiler :) Command Maker :) Shop Maker :)
Aswell as alot of tutorials on how to "Dope" your server up eg. Spawning,Npc Drops, Npc Talking, Object Spawns etc..
Wish me luck and thankyou for people supporting or waiting for this to come out :P
I will post again when I'm done.

item.title: Bonzakids Pack
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

So you’re saying having a needlessly bloated compiler, even more commands in their already beyond bloated “client” classes makes life easier? Sure maybe a shop maker could make it slightly easier, but if you can’t create shops as it is, I wouldn’t bother with anything RS server related.

Read full topic

item.title: Bonzakids Pack
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:1, topic:182913”]Between now and Next Month I am making a Utility pack for people to use that will include some things.

A Good Compiler
Command Maker
Shop Maker

Aswell as alot of tutorials on how to “Dope” your server up eg. Spawning,Npc Drops, Npc Talking, Object Spawns etc…

Wish me luck and thankyou for people supporting or waiting for this to come out

I will post again when I’m done.[/quote]

All a “good” ‘compiler’ needs is

javac *.java

Why would you even want a command maker?
Why would you need a shop maker?

Read full topic
